name: Cart Drawer - Handling quantity adjustments in the cart - Validate that the system prevents users from adding quantities beyond available stock and resets the value if the user exceeds the available quantity.
fullName: mason_sb_minicart_drawer_guest.spec.js#Mason Cart Drawer Cart Drawer - Handling quantity adjustments in the cart - Validate that the system prevents users from adding quantities beyond available stock and resets the value if the user exceeds the available quantity.
